entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow early in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 near noon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
